page.title: 14Spare time (page 3)
page.content: Horse riding is not quite as popular but that's because not many people have horses.Skate boarding is second to least favourite and skate boarding was the craze the other year. A skate board is a board of wood with four small wheels on the bottom two at each end.People balance on it and push themselves along and sometimes do some trick on it.Playing on your computer is the least popular and thats probably because when they first got a computer they played on it so much that they got a bit bored with it and didn't play on it much after. Anyway only 21 children have got their own computers out of the 43 children I asked.
